post.body: Yeah. It's pretty pathetic.
That's how freaked out I got when I was talking to him. Shaking hands, teeth chattering. Yeah, I'm nuts.
Facebook chat. Sry. I'm still trying to control the shaking.
Tough life! I'm crazy shy and didn't realize I had left fbchat open and was pissed at myself for it.
Because I'm so damn nice/socially awkward that I can't say no to anything.
Sorry, just freaking out and shaking. Return to regularly scheduled programming
No need to apologize, it was hilarious.
Looking forward to it :D
Get some sleep
Thanks, you too!
Whew, it's over. For now. Why the hell did I give him my number?
Seriously, having a panic attack from this. ::shiver::
Yaaaaaaaarg, make it stop!
Oh, dude from high school, I'm even more unattractive than I was back then. Please don't try to pick me up on facebook. Embarassing.
I just saw Benjamin Button. I dont think Ive ever cried that much during a movie.
My dad: "This morning I washed my hair with antibacterial hand soap and its so soft now." ::sigh::
Dear etsy and urbanoutfitters, stop having awesome things; you are making me poor. Love, Meg
When my office door is closed and I can hear not only you, but the person you're talking to on your cell, you're risking a smack.
Woo, another pointless day at work in my empty office. So. Much. Fun.
OMG, a preview for 30 Rock that looks like Liz dating a little person.
